project_plan.name: Temperature Converter Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement the temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement the temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement the temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement the temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement the temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement the temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion features
Execute tests on all implemented conversion features to ensure they function correctly
